data.name: Credits
data.value:
**SharpCut** A simple video cutting utility
**Developed and maintained by** Philip Butkiewicz (bagno) <https://github.com/philipbutkiewicz>
** Translations ** This application was translated with the help of several contributors.
**Polish** Philip Butkiewicz (bagno) <https://github.com/philipbutkiewicz>
**Japanese** Philip Butkiewicz (bagno) <https://github.com/philipbutkiewicz>
**Italian** bovirus <https://github.com/bovirus>
**Simplified Chinese** wcxu21 <https://github.com/wcxu21>
